functionDescription: This function updates the garbage collector's state and sets it up for an incremental cycle, adjusting the debt to match the step size.

inputInterfaces.name: kind
inputInterfaces.meaning: Type of garbage collection to perform

inoutInterfaces.name: L
inoutInterfaces.meaning: Lua state object representing the current thread

inoutInterfaces.name: g
inoutInterfaces.meaning: Global state of the Lua environment
